text: John Taylor (25 September 1942 â€“ 17 July 2015) was a British jazz pianist. He was born in Manchester. Taylor was known for forming the Jazz band Azimuth. Taylor died of a heart attack at the age of 72. ==Other websites== * * BBC Music Review of the John Taylor album Rosslyn * Jazz Times on John Taylor & Kenny Wheeler Category:1942 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:British jazz musicians Category:British pianists Category:Musicians from Manchester
